_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Engineered Polymer Solutions, d/b/a Valspar Coatings (Valspar) personnel in Wheeling, Illinois take great pride in maintaining a safe operation for the employees, the community, and the environment.  The primary focus is to prevent accidental releases before they occur, while providing systems that minimize the  of any release that does occur and contain it in as small as area as possible.


ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PREVENTION AND EMERGENCY RESPONSE POLICIES:  It is Valspar's policy to operate its facilities in a manner that protect its employees, the public, and the environment.  It is our policy to adhere to all applicable federal, state and local laws.  The Valspar Wheeling, Illinois facility has a detailed, practiced Emergency Response Plan that is utilized to respond to any accidental releases.


FACILITY DESCRIPTION:  The Valspar Wheeling, Illinois warehouse stores and distributes architectural and industrial aerosol coatings.  The aerosol coatings are contained in pressurized spray cans.  The spray cans utilize a flammable mixture of propane and/or n-butane as a propellant.


GENERAL ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PREVENTION PROGRAM AND CHEMICAL-SPECIFIC PREVENTION STEPS:  The aerosol spray cans are stored in a designated area within the warehouse and the warehouse is equipped with a fire suppression system.


FIVE-YEAR ACCIDENT HISTORY:  The Valspar Wheeling, Illinois warehouse has never had an accident involving flammable propellants that resulted in injuries, property damage or environmental releases.


EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM:  In the event of an emergency involving flammable propellants, warehouse personnel will notify the Wheeling Fire Department and rely on their expertise to handle the situation.  We have provided the fire department with our Emergency Response Plan and members of the fire department have inspected the warehouse.  In addition, Valspar has a contract with a qualified emergency response firm to aid in the cleanup of a release.


PLAN

NED CHANGES TO IMPROVE SAFETY:  Valspar has an ongoing and continuing process to audit, update and review our manufacturing process for safety considerations. No current changes are planned based upon the review.
